articles.author: Owen Walker
articles.title: Swiss government cuts bonuses for 1000 senior Credit Suisse bankers - Financial Times
articles.description: Executive team will lose outstanding variable pay entirely following lender’s rescue by UBS
articles.content: The Swiss government has cut bonuses for about 1,000 senior bankers at Credit Suisse, with the executive team losing their outstanding variable pay entirely, after the lenders rescue by its rival UBS… [+2637 chars]
